DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the dipping status of blood pressure (wether blood pressure decreases at night) and renal functional reserve and wether non-dippers (those whose blood pressure does not decrease at night) can be modulated to dippers with potassium treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Pre-ESRD Syndrome in High Risk African Americans
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation of the dipping status of blood pressure (wether blood pressure decreases at night) and renal functional reserve and wether non-dippers (those whose blood pressure does not decrease at night) can be modulated to dippers with potassium treatment.
DOC.criteria: 1835, healthy volunteers, African American Active medical conditions, prescription drug therapy other than birth control
